A few - out of context - equations to fight your boredome:

\[\nabla_\phi \mathbb{E}_{q(\mathbf{z}|\phi)}\left[ f(\mathbf{z}) \right] ~=~ \mathbb{E}_{q(\mathbf{z}|\phi)}\,[ f(\mathbf{z})\, \nabla_{q(\mathbf{z}|\phi)} \log q(\mathbf{z}|\phi) ]\]
